typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		PARENT_TARGET_CODE as string,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> vcrossreference
vcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==50) ~> country50
vcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> area219
vcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==374) ~> regionA374
vcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==367) ~> region367
vcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==219) ~> region219
xRefCountry50, xRefRegion219 join(country_parent_target_code == REGION_TARGET_CODE
	&& country_parent_code_type_id == REGION_CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> join1xRefCountryRegion
country50 select(mapColumn(
		country_source_CODE_KEY = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		country_source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		country_target_code = TARGET_CODE,
		country_target_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		country_code_type = CODE_TYPE,
		country_code_type_id = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		country_parent_code_type_id = PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
		country_parent_target_code = PARENT_TARGET_CODE,
		country_code2 = CODE2,
		country_om_x_ref = OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefCountry50
region219 select(mapColumn(
		REGION_SOURCE_CODE_KEY = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		REGION_SOURCE_SYSTEM = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		REGION_CODE_TYPE = CODE_TYPE,
		REGION_CODE_TYPE_ID = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID = PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_PARENT_TARGET_CODE = PARENT_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_CODE2 = CODE2,
		REGION_OM_X_REF = OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefRegion219
area219 select(mapColumn(
		area_SOURCE_CODE_KEY = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		area_SOURCE_SYSTEM = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		area_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		area_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		area_CODE_TYPE = CODE_TYPE,
		area_CODE_TYPE_ID = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		area_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID = PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
		area_PARENT_TARGET_CODE = PARENT_TARGET_CODE,
		area_CODE2 = CODE2,
		area_OM_X_REF = OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefArea219
join1xRefCountryRegion, xRefArea219 join(country_parent_target_code == area_TARGET_CODE
	&& country_parent_code_type_id == area_CODE_TYPE_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1xRefCountryRegionArea
Join1xRefCountryRegionArea select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_TARGET_CODE = country_target_code,
		COUNTRY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = country_target_description,
		COUNTRY_CODE2 = country_code2,
		COUNTRY_OM_X_REF = country_om_x_ref,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		AREA_TARGET_CODE = area_TARGET_CODE,
		AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = area_TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AREA3
xRefCountry50, xRefregionA374 join(country_parent_code_type_id == REGION_A_CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& country_parent_target_code == REGION_A_TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join0COUNTRYREGIONA
regionA374 select(mapColumn(
		REGION_A_SOURCE_CODE_KEY = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		REGION_A_SOURCE_SYSTEM = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		REGION_A_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_A_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		REGION_A_CODE_TYPE = CODE_TYPE,
		REGION_A_CODE_TYPE_ID = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_A_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID = PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_A_PARENT_TARGET_CODE = PARENT_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_A_CODE2 = CODE2,
		REGION_A_OM_X_REF = OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefregionA374
Join0COUNTRYREGIONA, xRefRegion367 join(REGION_A_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == REGION_CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& REGION_A_PARENT_TARGET_CODE == REGION_TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join0COUNTRYREGIONAREGION
region367 select(mapColumn(
		REGION_SOURCE_CODE_KEY = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		REGION_SOURCE_SYSTEM = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE = TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		REGION_CODE_TYPE = CODE_TYPE,
		REGION_CODE_TYPE_ID = CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID = PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID,
		REGION_PARENT_TARGET_CODE = PARENT_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_CODE2 = CODE2,
		REGION_OM_X_REF = OM_X_REF
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xRefRegion367
Join0COUNTRYREGIONAREGION, xRefArea219 join(REGION_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == area_CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& REGION_PARENT_TARGET_CODE == area_TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join0
Join0 select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_TARGET_CODE = country_target_code,
		COUNTRY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = country_target_description,
		COUNTRY_CODE2 = country_code2,
		COUNTRY_OM_X_REF = country_om_x_ref,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		AREA_TARGET_CODE = area_TARGET_CODE,
		AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = area_TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AREA2
xRefCountry50, xRefRegion367 join(country_parent_code_type_id == REGION_CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& country_parent_target_code == REGION_TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCOUNTRYREGION
JoinCOUNTRYREGION, xRefArea219 join(REGION_PARENT_CODE_TYPE_ID == area_CODE_TYPE_ID
	&& REGION_PARENT_TARGET_CODE == area_TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join
Join select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_TARGET_CODE = country_target_code,
		COUNTRY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = country_target_description,
		COUNTRY_CODE2 = country_code2,
		COUNTRY_OM_X_REF = country_om_x_ref,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		AREA_TARGET_CODE = area_TARGET_CODE,
		AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = area_TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AREA1
AREA1, AREA2, AREA3 union(byName: true)~> SetOperation
SetOperation aggregate(groupBy(COUNTRY_TARGET_CODE,
		COUNTRY_CODE2,
		COUNTRY_OM_X_REF,
		REGION_TARGET_CODE,
		REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		AREA_TARGET_CODE,
		AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION),
	COUNTRY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(COUNTRY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> Deduplicator
Deduplicator derive(TARGET_CODE_AR2 = case
(
    compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'AME')==0, AREA_TARGET_CODE, 
    (
        case
        (
            compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'ASI')==0, AREA_TARGET_CODE, 
            (
                case
                    (
                        compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'EUR')==0, 
                        
                            case
                                (
                                    compare(REGION_TARGET_CODE,'SCA')==0, REGION_TARGET_CODE, AREA_TARGET_CODE 
                                ), 
                                case
                                    (
                                        compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'RUS')==0, 'EUR', 'OTH'
                                    ) 
                        
                    )
            )
        )
    )
),
		TARGET_DESC_AR2 = case
(
    compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'AME')==0, AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION, 
    (
        case
        (
            compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'ASI')==0, AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION, 
            (
                case
                    (
                        compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'EUR')==0, 
                        
                            case
                                (
                                    compare(REGION_TARGET_CODE,'SCA')==0, REGION_TARGET_DESCRIPTION, AREA_TARGET_DESCRIPTION 
                                ), 
                                case
                                    (
                                        compare(AREA_TARGET_CODE,'RUS')==0, 'Europe', 'Other'
                                    ) 
                        
                    )
            )
        )
    )
)) ~> Expression
Expression alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull())) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_country.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimCountry
